Text: Thank you very much for this
A big thanks. I've been really hoping someone would post this!!
does anyone know where to find this as an audiobook?

Was missing about 50 pages (came up as blank) on my particular download of it. Could be a shitty seeder out there, IDK.

Too bad I found out 40 pages into reading the book, gave up and just bought it from B&N.

for whatever reason the second half of each chapter would be blank on my kindle. I opened the PDF on my computer and it was all there, so it did download correctly. I ended up opening it on my computer and saving as a text instead of a PDF and the text format worked fine on my kindle (with text I lost pictures).

 So far a great book thanks for the upload.
